name: lb-151

scripts.test-html: set NODE_TESTING=testing&set NODE_ENV=production&mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportName=index,reportDir=mochawesome & start mochawesome/index.html
scripts.coverage: set NODE_TESTING=testing&set NODE_ENV=production&istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha & start coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test-full: set NODE_TESTING=testing&set NODE_ENV=production&istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportName=index,reportDir=mochawesome&start mochawesome/index.html&start coverage/lcov-report/index.html
